description: This file contains a module with functions to compute and summarize cloud cost data from a database, including total costs and breakdowns by provider and region.

methods.name: float _to_float(v)
methods.description: Converts various numeric types or None to float, returning 0.0 for None or conversion errors.

methods.name: dict get_cost_summary(session: AsyncSession, *, period: str = "monthly")
methods.description: Asynchronously computes total and segmented cloud costs from the database, returning a dictionary with summaries by provider and region.

ctags.name: get_cost_summary
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_cost_summary(session: AsyncSession, *, period: str = "monthly") -> dict:$/
